posts.postText:
I'm actually making this up as I type, because I died in TTT.

I believe traitors should get a DNA eraser. Basically, it would cost a credit, and could delete dna from bodies. It's not OP, and has a practical use. But, erasing evidence leaves evidence. When you search the body, you would see that the dna has been destroyed by an abnormal cause. You would get three charges, and it takes about two seconds to destroy a sample. 

+Support?
with one charge i could maybe agree, but definately not 3
If there was one, nobody would buy it. Try 2, I suppose.
Well, this is slightly different, as it would be slightly more stealthful, there'd be no burn mark. Another way this could work would be to a gloves item.
